resources.string: A duplicate ID exists. Please enter a different ID.
Your password must contain at least one number and uppercase letter.
Must contain at least one special character (~!@#$%^&*_-+=`|:;,.?/).
The password cannot contain Korean consonants or vowels.
The password must be at least 8 characters and not more than 20 characters in length.
The name cannot contain special characters.
Please enter 4 digits for the year and 2 digits for the month and day.

Blue Sofa Pasta, a steak restaurant in Yeonnam-dong that is good for a date in Yeonnam-dong. Let me introduce you to a steak restaurant in Yeonnam-dong that has a nice atmosphere and tastes good :) The alley is not crowded and it is not located in the downtown area, so it was not difficult to find! If you bring your car, there is nothing to worry about. There is a public parking lot nearby in Yeonnam-dong, so it wouldn\'t be a bad idea to park there and use it.
For Christmas, I\'m going to share my experience of going to a restaurant where you can\'t go without waiting~! This time, I went to a restaurant in Seoul!
" The end of 2023 is already here! To celebrate Christmas and the end of the year, we will introduce you to restaurants that are great to visit with your family or loved ones."
Introducing the best Makchang restaurant in Seoul~
